summary: Indonesia is a vast country made up of over 17,000 islands in Southeast Asia and Oceania. It's the world's largest country made of islands! With a population of over 280 million, it's also one of the most populous. Java, one of its islands, is the most crowded island globally. Indonesia has a rich history, with ancient kingdoms and trade links. It gained independence from Dutch rule after World War II. Today, it's known for its diverse culture, with many ethnic groups and languages, and its strong economy.
title: Indonesia
